title: Soup Noodles With Braised Beef
summary: Soup Noodles With Braised Beef is a dairy free side dish. One serving contains 158 calories, 4g of protein, and 10g of fat. For 78 cents per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 3. Autumn will be even more special with this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 10 minutes. 1 person found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying. If you have a few pieces of baby bok choy, spring onions to garnish, udon, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 25%. This score is rather bad. Similar recipes are Braised Beef Over Egg Noodles, Slow Braised Beef Stroganoff Soup, and Dragging Noodles with Beef and Bean Sprouts in Soup.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
